short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced features for Multi-Brick website navigation, avatar customization, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Multi Brick+ elevates the Multi-Brick website experience, offering advanced features like 3D avatar viewing, detailed equipment display, and customizable filtering options. This innovative extension includes a dedicated Discord button for quick access, eliminating the need for continuous searching. Key features include Discord-like interactive elements such as 'Hello', and a comprehensive settings menu that allows users to enable or disable various functionalities:

* Forums Image Embeds
* Badges Display
* Calculation of Posts Per Day
* Messaging System
* Shop Access
* Buck/Bit Conversions

In the Navbar, users can enjoy a customizable button with options for button name and link, colored icons, and a notifier. Stay updated with the latest tweets from @hillofbricks, and keep track of updates including first shop item updates, specials, new and updated items. As of now, we are constantly working on adding more features to enhance your experience, with more exciting updates to be released soon.

Credits to brick hill+ for the source code, code will be changed
